org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.mediation

Interface EmailSupport


  • public interface EmailSupport
    Email transport related operations
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBCCAddress(Message msg, java.lang.String email)
      Adds a BCC email address to the given message to be used when sending the message out via the email transport
      void addBCCAddresses(Message msg, java.util.List emails)
      Adds a list of BCC email addresses to the given message to be used when sending out via email transport
      void addCCAddress(Message msg, java.lang.String email)
      Adds a CC email address to the given message to be used when sending out via email transport
      void addCCAddresses(Message msg, java.util.List emails)
      Adds a list of CC email addresses to the given message to be used when sending out via email transport
      void setFromAddress(Message msg, java.lang.String email)
      Sets the SMTP from address for the given message to be used in sending the message out via the email transport
      void setSMTPCredentials(Message msg, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Sets and overrides any already defined SMTP credentials to the given message to be used in sending the message out via the SMTP transport
      void setSubject(Message msg, java.lang.String subject)
      Sets the email subject for the outgoing message via the email transport

    • Method Detail

      • setSubject

        void setSubject(Message msg,
              java.lang.String subject)
        Sets the email subject for the outgoing message via the email transport
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to which the subject to be set
        subject - the subject to be set for the given message

      • addCCAddress

                java.lang.String email)
        Adds a CC email address to the given message to be used when sending out via email transport
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to add the CC email address
        email - the email address to be added to the CC list

      • addCCAddresses

        void addCCAddresses(Message msg,
                  java.util.List emails)
        Adds a list of CC email addresses to the given message to be used when sending out via email transport
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to add the CC email addresses
        emails - the email addresses list to be added to the CC list

      • addBCCAddress

                 java.lang.String email)

        Parameters:
        msg - the message to add the BCC email address
        email - the email address to be added to the BCC list

      • addBCCAddresses

                   java.util.List emails)

        emails - the email addresses list to be added to the BCC list

      • setFromAddress

        void setFromAddress(Message msg,
                  java.lang.String email)
        Sets the SMTP from address for the given message to be used in sending the message out via the email transport
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to which the given from address will be set
        email - the from email address to be set to the message

      • setSMTPCredentials

        void setSMTPCredentials(Message msg,
                      java.lang.String user,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Sets and overrides any already defined SMTP credentials to the given message to be used in sending the message out via the SMTP transport
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to which the SMTP credentials are set
        user - the SMTP user to be used in sending out the message
        password - the SMTP authentication password to be used in sending the message out
